attributes.action: Ban cars from parking half on the path and half on the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I walk to work everyday and continually struggle to walk on the paths safely due to cars which are parked half on the path and half on the road, paths are not that wide anyway and this just makes it more difficult and dangerous.  Paths are meant for walking on and not to park cars etc.

More needs to be done by the relevant authorities to stop this from happening and to penalise people who do it.
